app.name: Stego
app.tagline: Steganography Tool - Hide data in images for secure transmission

home.title: Steganography Tool
home.subtitle: Hide data in images for secure transmission

encrypt.title: Encryption
encrypt.description: Embed data into images for steganography transmission

decrypt.title: Decryption
decrypt.description: Extract original data from steganographic images

generate.title: Generate Carrier Images
generate.description: Generate carrier images for steganography transmission

logs.title: Logs
logs.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all logs? This action cannot be undone.

about.title: About
about.author: Author
about.disclaimer: For learning purposes only, please do not use for illegal activities.

lsb.name: 2-bit LSB Steganography
lsb.desc: Uses 2 bits per color channel for data embedding, increasing capacity while maintaining visual imperceptibility

scatter.name: Random Scattered Writing
scatter.desc: Password-based Linear Congruential Generator (LCG) generates random sequences to scatter data throughout the image, avoiding statistical detection

aes.name: AES-GCM Encryption
aes.desc: Uses AES-256-GCM algorithm for data encryption, PBKDF2 key derivation (50000 iterations), ensuring data confidentiality and integrity

rs.name: Reed-Solomon Error Correction
rs.desc: RS(255,223) error correction coding, can correct up to 16 bytes of errors, improving data damage resistance

interleave.name: Data Interleaving
interleave.desc: Block interleaving disperses consecutive errors, converting burst errors to random errors, enhancing error correction capability

integrity.name: Integrity Verification
integrity.desc: SHA-256 hash checksum and CRC32 verification ensure data integrity during embedding and extraction

carrier.name: Carrier Image Generation
carrier.desc: Procedural gradient texture generation: 4-color palette, random angle linear gradient, sine wave gradient (75%+25% blend), low-frequency cloud texture (Box-Muller Gaussian noise + bilinear interpolation), vignette effect, Gaussian blur (radius=0.8, separable convolution optimization)

capacity.name: Automatic Capacity Calculation
capacity.desc: Calculates 2-bit LSB maximum capacity using formula capacity = (width × height × 3 × 2) / 8, automatically filters carriers meeting capacity requirements, supports texture quality scoring (Laplacian operator) to select optimal carriers

largeFile.name: Large File Support
largeFile.desc: Directories are automatically packaged as ZIP (Deflate compression), supporting steganography transmission of any size files and directories, automatic decompression and restoration during extraction
